Blackhawk Combat Suit Bundle (Male)
kDesc
Bring the assault from the skies with this advanced Blackhawk outfit. Bundle includes a helmet, top, bottom, gloves and shoes. [#Legal]
Donnez l'assaut depuis le ciel avec cette armure de pointe de Blackhawk. L'ensemble comprend un casque, un haut, un bas, des gants et des bottes. [#Legal]
Mit diesem Blackhawk-Anzug greifen Sie aus der Luft an. Das Set beinhaltet Helm, Oberteil, Unterteil, Handschuhe und Stiefel. [#Legal]
Sferra l'assalto dal cielo con questa tuta stile Blackhawk all'avanguardia. Il pacchetto include casco, corazza, pantaloni, guanti e scarpe. [#Legal]
Asalta al enemigo desde los cielos con este avanzado traje Blackhawk. El conjunto comprende casco, parte superior, parte inferior, guantes y calzado. [#Legal]
고성능 블랙호크 의상을 입고 하늘에서 맹공격을 퍼부으십시오. 이 세트는 헬멧, 상의, 하의, 장갑, 그리고 신발을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
Bring the assault from the skies with this advanced Blackhawk outfit. Bundle includes a helmet, top, bottomm, gloves and shoes. [#Legal]
穿上這套先進的黑鷹套裝，攻擊空中的敵人。本服裝組包括頭盔、上身、下身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
穿上這套先進的黑鷹套裝，攻擊空中的敵人。本服裝組包括頭盔、上半身、下半身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
Bring the assault from the skies with this advanced Blackhawk outfit. Bundle includes a helmet, top, bottomm, gloves and shoes. [#Legal]
